speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, today I recognize Heidi Wentzlaff, an intern in my Sioux Falls, SD office, for all of the hard work she has done for me, my staff, and the State of South Dakota over the past several months.

Heidi is a graduate of Centerville Public High School in Centerville, SD. Currently she is attending Augustana College, where she is majoring in government and international affairs. She is a hard worker who has been dedicated to getting the most out of her internship experience.
I extend my sincere thanks and appreciation to Heidi for all of the fine work she has done and wish her continued success in the years to come.
